docs.text: Home About Simplexp Super simple storage of XP How to use this wiki You can find all the wiki pages (articles) on the sidebar. Click to view. You can contribute to the wiki thru github.

docs.text: You can find all the wiki pages (articles) on the sidebar. Click to view. You can contribute to the wiki thru github.
docs.title: How to use this wiki

docs.text: Contributing Very cool that you are interesting in contributing to this project! This guide does not cover usage of git/github Adding translation To add translation: Go to src/main/resources/assets/simplexp/lang Copy en_us.json into your_language.json Edit the english translation into your language Submit a pull request! Todo list A todo list can be found on github . Last word Thanks! 💜
docs.title: Contributing

docs.text: Very cool that you are interesting in contributing to this project! This guide does not cover usage of git/github
docs.title: Contributing

docs.text: To add translation: Go to src/main/resources/assets/simplexp/lang Copy en_us.json into your_language.json Edit the english translation into your language Submit a pull request!
docs.title: Adding translation

docs.text: A todo list can be found on github .
docs.title: Todo list

docs.text: FAQ Please update to [insert version here] No. This mod was made for a "ModJam", not something i want to maintain. It is a lot of work making mods, and i have other things to do, rather then sitting infront of my computer doing stuff i don't want to. I found this bug/I want to ask something/I want a feature Create a Github issue Can i use it in a modpack? Yes! Feel free to use it in your modpack, but you must credit me with the link to either modrinth or github Can i contribute? Yes! 💜 Contributions are more then welcome! More info on that in the contributing wiki article.
docs.title: FAQ

docs.text: Glossary In this wiki ill be using some words or abbreviations that you may not know. So please read this page to discover what the different words mean XP XP = E x erience P oint EXP EXP = Exp erience point. Same as XP ModJam A ModJam is sortof like a GameJam, just for mods. If you don't know what a GameJam is, it is basicly that you make a game, with a short deadline.
docs.title: Glossary
